sentences.sentence: "Obelisks" (tall four-sided tapered monuments) were carefully constructed and even purposefully geographically located around 3500 BC.
sentences.translation: “方尖碑”（高大的四边锥形纪念碑）是在公元前3500年精心建造的，甚至在地理位置上也是有目的的。

sentences.sentence: One passes under pyramids and obelisks, all on a heroic scale.
sentences.translation: 一个人经过规模宏大的金字塔和方尖石塔。

sentences.sentence: The obelisks was erected first in Heliopolis, Egypt, in 1600 b.
sentences.translation: 公元前1600年方尖碑首先竖立在埃及赫利奥·波利斯。
